about_the_game:
Bring fun to the land of the dead with this FREE summer costume for Sen. While Sen is in your party and wearing this costume, Revenants with uncollected memories will be drawn to you, allowing you to finish collecting the Memoirs of the Dead!
*The feature only works on levels where Revenants with memories appear.
